text: Bahuta zi'ada kitaba vale dilom' cahude hana ki tuhade momina (imana vale) ho jana tom ba'ada, ise tar'ham uha phira tuhanu munakara (avagi'akari) bana dena, apani irakha de karana, isa de bavajuda ki saca'i unham de sahamane sapasata ho cuki hai. Ata mafa karo ate anaditha karo ithom taka ki alaha da faisala a ja'e. Besaka alaha nu hara cija te samaratha prapata hai
